53eb2127-7823-4602-a17c-902bba5930b7.description: The holder of this credential has received their Capital Markets & Payment Solutions Certificate. This represents completion of a 4 day course designed by Alpha development in partnership with CapGemini, and achieving 70% or higher on the final assessment. This program develops knowledge & understanding in financial markets & instruments, market drivers, & the clients’ needs & expectations for each product. This program also delves into various international banking payments systems & platforms.
53eb2127-7823-4602-a17c-902bba5930b7.name: Capital Markets and Payment Systems Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete Module 1 which builds understanding in the following areas: Money Markets, Macroeconomics, Financial Maths, FX Markets, Fixed Income Markets, Equity Markets and Derivatives
Successfully complete Module 2 which builds understanding in the following areas: Payment Systems, International Payments and Technologies.
Complete an assessment covering the scope of curriculum in Modules 1 and 2 and achieving a pass mark of 70%.

skills.name: Calculate time value of money and forward and present value of cash amounts and flow.
Understand banking payment systems, platforms and technologies.
Understand cross border payments including SEPA, ecommerce and merchant services.
Understand fixed income markets and instruments including macro economic drivers.
Understand foreign exchange markets including key market drivers and instruments used.
Understanding key concepts in the equity markets and how investors use these instruments.
Understand macroeconomic principles, central bank responsibilities and government economic policy
Understand money market instruments and interest rate transactions
Understand technology evolution in the banking and payments industry.
Understand the derivatives markets and pricing instruments such as forwards, futures and options.

ce6be5c1-5c82-43c5-85fa-b254726441e4.description: The holder of the badge has successfully completed the 'Creating Meaningful Stories on our Capabilities' module. Getting your message across in this environment can be challenging, especially in a time of market turmoil and performance. Client requirements can be complex and decision makers diverse. The ability to construct stories that are relevant, memorable and repeatable is vital.
ce6be5c1-5c82-43c5-85fa-b254726441e4.name: Client Engagement Programme - Creating Meaningful Stories on our Capabilities

badge_template_activities.title: Multi Week Module that includes workshop and applied coaching sessions.

skills.name: Be able to create talking points that challenge the status quo
Be able to effectively telling the firm's ESG story
Be able to present and package data into storytelling themes
Be able to show prominence in messages on the firm's capabilities
Be able to turn information into insight

1124873a-8e83-46dd-b66e-b734272bb2be.description: The holder of the badge has successfully completed 6 professional skills modules on building emotional and social intelligence. This course explores the importance of intra- and interpersonal skills required for Emotional Intelligence. Through a combination of theory, discussions, vignettes, and learning activities, participants will be able to see themselves and others, as well as analyze their own and others’ behaviours.
1124873a-8e83-46dd-b66e-b734272bb2be.name: High Value Analyst Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this course badge would have completed 3 days of learning in an in-person workshop. During the session learners have completed 6 workshops that include,- Developing self-awareness- Cultivating a growth mindset- Maximizing your time- Receiving and giving feedback- Maintaining your focus- Building resilience

ba765ef4-447e-4d27-bad3-51636ed24b17.description: The holder of this credential has received their Capital Markets and Payment Solutions Award. This represents successful completion of a 4 day course designed by Alpha development in partnership with CapGemini. This program develops knowledge & understanding in financial markets & instruments, market drivers, & the clients’ needs & expectations for each product. In addition, this program delves into various international banking payments systems & platforms.
ba765ef4-447e-4d27-bad3-51636ed24b17.name: Capital Markets and Payment Systems Award

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed Module 1 which builds understanding in the following areas: Money Markets, Macroeconomics, Financial Maths, FX Markets, Fixed Income Markets, Equity Markets and Derivatives
Successfully completed Module 2 which builds understanding in the following areas: Payment Systems, International Payments and Technologies.

skills.name: Calculate time value of money and forward and present value of cash amounts and flow.
Understand banking payment systems, platforms and technologies.
Understand cross border payments including SEPA, ecommerce and merchant services.
Understand fixed income markets and instruments including macro economic drivers.
Understand foreign exchange markets including key market drivers and instruments used.
Understanding key concepts in the equity markets and how investors use these instruments.
Understand macroeconomic principles, central bank responsibilities and government economic policy
Understand money market instruments and interest rate transactions
Understand technology evolution in the banking and payments industry.
Understand the derivatives markets and pricing instruments such as forwards, futures and options.

1c3763fd-b268-4fbc-b5d6-25217827b908.description: The holder of this badge has successfully completed the Cultivating Growth Mindset course which will help them to understand their mindset and the impact it has on their relationships and personal satisfaction, as well as performance. It also delves into how it enables them to consciously identify opportunities to continuously learn, develop and grow.
1c3763fd-b268-4fbc-b5d6-25217827b908.name: Cultivating a Growth Mindset

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1/2 day course with the following learning outcomes:- Challenge self-perceptions and explore new development opportunities- Reflect on the importance of mindset and the impact it can have on productivity, relationships and outcomes- Create a conscious awareness of current mindset and develop strategies for consciously shifting mindset- Understand the importance of intention, and the impact on outcome

3110f30d-5937-482a-b7fe-b7857a83ae42.description: The holder of this badge has successfully completed the Design Thinking Experience workshop. The programme explores practical processes that can help anyone think like a designer in order to solve problems, create new ideas and innovate their way to success.
3110f30d-5937-482a-b7fe-b7857a83ae42.name: Design Thinking

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 90 minutes learning module that explores the design thinking iterative process.
Complete a 90 minutes application workshop that tackles a problem using the design thinking process.

2b67e3bb-fdcc-44a0-9a44-7b413a8b40c0.description: We have all likely experienced periods of being highly focused. Periods of time when you’re able to attack your to-do list with energy and purpose, no task being too big or too weighty. Then at other times, it can feel impossible to focus yourself on the smallest of chores. Holders of this badge have completed a course course that allows them to gain an understanding of their brain and what encourages it (and discourages it) to focus throughout each day and week.
2b67e3bb-fdcc-44a0-9a44-7b413a8b40c0.name: Maintaining your Focus

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1/2 day course with the following learning outcomes:- Challenge the 9 – 5 work day does not suit everyone- Understand how focus ebbs and flows through the day- Reflect on the patterns of focus and energy which you typically experience- Switch bad habits for good, which will banish distractions and help you reach peak performance- Adopt regular break times which allow you to rest and replenish your reserves

624c3374-65e6-4a2a-aece-fafecf0de690.description: Managing our time efficiently is a constant struggle for many but maintaining our energy levels so as to remain positive and engaged in what we do adds another level of complexity. The holder of this badge has completed the maximising your time course. This course reviews how we spend our time – both in and out of work – and allows participants to reflect on whether they are achieving the right balance in order to stay energised and satisfied.
624c3374-65e6-4a2a-aece-fafecf0de690.name: Maximising Your Time

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1/2 day course with the following learning outcomes:- Challenge unconscious behaviours that allow time to be wasted- Create habits that encourage good time management and generate positive energy- Build awareness on what creates or depletes energy levels- Change behaviours to ensure conscious choice on how time is spent- Prioritise effectively to plan and implement positive working methods

63656732-8757-453f-880a-e929f9c24848.description: In the early stages of our career, we strive to make a good impression and get things right. As with any learning process, we may excel, or we may need to correct some actions. The holder of this badge has successfully completed a course on mastering the art of asking for feedback, processing the information and managing a potentially challenging conversation as a critical skill.
63656732-8757-453f-880a-e929f9c24848.name: Receiving and Giving Feedback

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1/2 day course with the following learning outcomes:- Challenge current thinking about the fears of asking for feedback.- Create enhanced and trusting relationships by asking for feedback professionally.- Create new habits and skills in the way we ask for feedback, especially constructive feedback.- Change how you manage a conversation when asking for feedback.- Change how you provide feedback if asked by a peer.

865a1d86-99f0-4513-b684-0b7af474aed8.description: Self-awareness is the ability to understand ourselves from the inside out and the outside in and can be seen as the “meta-skill” of the 21st century. Our level of self-awareness underpins our ability make an impact, communicate, lead others and navigate challenging situations.
865a1d86-99f0-4513-b684-0b7af474aed8.name: Self-Awareness

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1/2 day course with the following learning outcomes:- Appreciate the importance of self-awareness in your role.- Identify which pillars of self-awareness need deeper understanding.- Explore new perspectives in self-understanding.- Consider new habits to improve in-the-moment insight into the impact you are making.- Remove any road-blocks which may be getting in the way of self-understanding.- Proactively seek feedback to enhance your self-awareness.

95320243-03f2-49c5-ab15-f2ab98fbf0ab.description: Stress is a reality of modern life and can, in limited amounts, help us maximise our potential. An overload of stress, however, can lead to fatigue, burnout, and impact our long-term physical and mental health. Using a range of tools and techniques, holders of this badge have explored and learned how to keep their stress at an optimal level and balance pressure and performance."
95320243-03f2-49c5-ab15-f2ab98fbf0ab.name: Building Resilience

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1/2 day course with the following learning outcomes:- Challenge your own reactions, and learn that stress can be managed effectively, even positively with thought and planning.- Create a more resilient approach to causes of stress in your life.- Practice healthy, stress reducing habits.- Accept uncertainty and build a toolkit of responses to allow flexibility and adaptability.- Apply a range of tools to reduce stress and increase long-term resilience.

cdcbdf5d-0f52-415f-aa82-5cb9f2fb7c93.description: It has been estimated that, on average, we spend 23 hours a week in meetings. Meetings are vitally important – if done well. Meetings help people feel included, trusted, and that they are important team members. They also give the opportunity for individuals and teams to contribute to the success of the company. Done badly, they are costly, inefficient, demotivating and the scourge of the working week. Making Meetings Matter is an interactive session designed to equip participants with the skill
cdcbdf5d-0f52-415f-aa82-5cb9f2fb7c93.name: Making Meetings Matter

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this course badge would have completed 60-90 minutes of learning in a virtual classroom. During the session learners will challenge the value of time spent in meetings, create effective agendas and change their next meeting experience. Learners will also go through a short case study that reviews preparing for and running effective meetings.

b9af15a8-0cde-497f-93e7-d4a0ad05005a.description: The holder of the badge has successfully completed 6 professional skills modules on building emotional and social intelligence. This course explores the importance of intra- and interpersonal skills required for Emotional Intelligence. Through a combination of theory, discussions, vignettes, and learning activities, participants will be able to see themselves and others, as well as analyze their own and others’ behaviours.
b9af15a8-0cde-497f-93e7-d4a0ad05005a.name: High Value Analyst Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this course badge would have completed 3 days of learning in an in-person workshop. During the session learners have completed 6 workshops that include,- Developing self-awareness- Cultivating a growth mindset- Maximizing your time- Receiving and giving feedback- Maintaining your focus- Building resilience. Top Performer - Indicates that the recipient was one of the top performers in the training session.
